original_title: What a Beautiful World This Will Be
overview: Official Selection Palm Springs International ShortsFest, Slamdance: Anarchy Shorts, Raindance Film Festival  A magical-realist detective story sprawling across the frozen Brooklyn expanse. An underemployed, young drunk crawls out of bed to find his missing friend while a mysterious disease called “the blank” ravages the city and a giant conqueror worm crawls along the sky.
title: What a Beautiful World This Will Be
